fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Competition, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives:
We are following activities related to: 
 
Entrepreneurship competence framework 
 
HEInnovate 
 
University - Business collaboration 
 
Regional development 
 
SMEs 
 
Innovations
organisation_name: J.J. Strossmayer University in Osijek, Faculty of Economics, International Centre for Entrepreneurial Studies (ICES)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
membership: Network of UNESCO Chairs in Entrepreneurship Education
goals__remit:
To provide research activities focused on firm's behaviour, entrepreneurship and regional development 
 
To provide education on undergraduate, graduate and postgraduate level entrepreneurship and regional development
relevant_communication:
participating in projects EE-HUB, ICEE, SE360, Masters, CUVID, INTENSE - all funded by EU Erasmus or CIP programs. Projects EE_HUB, ICEE and SE360 are led by JA-YE, Brussels; Masters and CUVID are led by bit cz training, Prague ; INTENSE is led by Hochschule fuer Technic und Wirtschaft, Berlin. Focuses of all projects are entrepreneurship education and social entrepreneurship 
 
participating in the BTAR project, funded by EU and led by SEAMK, Finland - focused on business transfer issues 
 
participating in EEEPHIC project, funded by EU and led by Ecorys, the Netherlands - focused on implementation of HEInnovate
